title: FS: A few T205 & T206 plus N172 Van Haltren prices lowered
author: powderfinger

posts.post_title: FS: A few T205 & T206 plus N172 Van Haltren prices lowered
posts.post_content:
Over the past few months, I've moved away from collecting tobacco cards and have now decided to sell the last few that I have.  They are personal favorites, and the last to go.  If you are interested, email me at [url]rnovak14@wi.rr.com[/url].  Buyer is responsible for postage.

T205 Wilhelm "suffe ed" card is definitely trimmed, but is uncreased and about the size of an American Beauty.  Shows very nicely.  $145

T206 Steinfeldt portrait P150, creased, raw, probably a 10.  $18

T206 Wilhelm, hands at chest, PSA2 $23

T206 Merkle, SC350, card is heavily creased and might only be an AUTH, but has the partial factory 30 stamp in the lower gutter of th reverse.  $65

N172 Van Haltren SGC AUTH.  Heavy crease across center of card and skinned.  Batting pose with bat cross body, head of bat almost to right border.  $100

These are now rock bottom, so prices are firm!

I'm switching from a Dell to a MAC, so scans are tough. I can send photos if you're interested.
